emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of four men wearing tuxedos, and four women, including Toki Schalk Johnson, center, and possibly Ethel Ramos Harris, far right, seated at rectangular banquet table for Chi Delta Mu dinner dance in New Arena Supper Club
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 20, 1960, pg. B10 reads: "Chi Delta Mu Fraternity Entertains Lavishly." Portion of accompanying article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 20, 1960, pg. A7 by Toki Schalk Johnson reads:"Wednesday brought forth the annual dinner dance given by the Chi Delta Mu Fraternity in beautifully decorated New Arena."
